title: +1 to respect riot
body:
i was so busy to play game after s5 & s6, came back and still enjoying game so hard, many things improved. 
+1 to say a thanks to riot games

replies.body: are we playing the same game?
Not everyone hates the game.
And just because there are people that don't hate it doesn't mean the game isn't going to shit.
Just look at the exodus of streamers.
And just because there are people who do hate it doesn't mean it's going to shit.
Guess what, neither do I, stop making assumptions

Curious.
OP said "still enjoying game so hard" and you responded with "are we playing the same game?"
What should we assume from that sequence?

Glad you don't hate the game. Rift well.
I love the core gameplay, I jus't don't like that the game is balanced as a 1 shot fest, that hasn't improved

So, do you tend to favor tank/bruiser metas?
And I agree that upfront/1 shot type damage has been very prevalent particularly since this last midseason.
No. I don't prefer any meta. I prefer champions to not do shit tons of damage for no reason. Every champion does too much damage right now
Ok, could you describe a particular meta that existed that you enjoyed? I'd be interested to hear it.

As long as it's not a meta where Sejuani is a dominant champion I don't care about metas. I don't even know why you are insisting on making this discussion about metas, I just wish there was less damage in this game.

I'm asking because I am interested in what you would like to see in the game, not what you would not like.
You've stated quite well what you are unhappy with. You don't like the overbearing damage.
I mentioned a well known meta (the tank meta) in which damage was considered low, and teamfights were long.
{{champion:113}} was strong during a portion of this meta - LOL.

What I am trying to ask is for you to point to a state of the game that you considered balanced towards your preference.
Call it meta, call it season. What was a good state of the game (that has existed) from your perspective?

I think season 5 was the best personally. And yes during the tank meta damage was low but it was way too low, at least tanks were unkillable and I don't think anyone enjoys playing against unkillable champions. Forgot to mention when I mean season 5 I'm excluding the Juggernaut patches cause those patches were garbage, they had exactly the same problem as the tank meta meaning juggernauts were unkillable.

Thank you. That makes sense.
Less damage, but not to the point where the beefy champs like tanks/juggernauts are unkillable.
That would be nice.

Thank you for responding. Rift well.

Not everyone hates eating shit. Does that mean that eating shit is good?

This idea that, "well this cant be bad because some people like it" is a horrible argument because you will find people that like literally anything and everything even when its against the norm or goes against the morality of society. Some people like %%%%philia and murder, that doesnt mean those things have merit.

League has betrayed its core values of counterplay, being able to react, having strategy, not getting instantly killed 'by the first punch' as Riot put it. I think that means the game is pretty fucking bad right now.

I'm sorry, but you looked way further into my words than I even said. I never made that argument to begin with...I said, "Some people still like the game" - and that's because some people do. Your opinion is that it's comparable to eating shit - that's your opinion... but not everyone has that opinion, which was my argument. It's nice to actually see a positive post for once on these boards, but go figure people gotta step in and tell the people that are genuinely enjoying that game that they aren't really enjoying it, or that they are enjoying eating shit lol.   

The time I hated the game the most was Dynamic queue and nothing has come close to how bad the game was during that time. Even then, I still played the game, and 'mostly' had fun. Maybe I just like eating shit, I don't know.

Ok but that doesn't really change an objective view.

Though I will admit, the game is probably better than it was in season 6.
How is people's opinion of the game state an objective view? It's an opinion for a preference...
I'm pretty sure the OP is being ironic.
I'm not sure about that, he barely played during s7 and he is only level 36

Let the man enjoy the game if he does.

We're not here to assimilate everyone's opinions, now.

nice to see a post like this, we are quick to post when we are upset, but often forget to say thanks or good job when we like something

Jesus christ so much hate for this man. Seems like you get hate if you don't believe what the rest of the board believes.
Of course. This place is an echo chamber.
Of course it is an echo chamber what else could it be? A platform for real discussions? Haha... oh wait.

If we had real discussion, everyone would or should just be okay and could accept that we can still have a  swain. and this new champion is exactly that. A new champion, new look new voice new moves. might as well be vlad cousin so just make it that way. people  like the champion so let them keep it. But when you been maining a swain for 5 years and now you can't..... just why? idk why we can't have best of both worlds. So if you comment is how much im an idiot and swain sucked blah blah. Not everyone felt that way. so make it right.    I want My pimp walk back and my pimp cane and  i want to give people the bird. Just sayin.

I understand that you can get attached to something if you use it for so long, but if this leads to you not seeing problems, then you are just biased because it's your favorite champion.

I gotta say that of all the rework I think that Swain is the most underwhelming one. My problem in particular are the stacks he uses for his ult. To me it seems like a rushed mechanic and I don't think it's meaningful.

However I absolutely do think that the old Swain was garbage and needed a rework.

I don't see the point to deny that Swain was outdated and more importantly how can you even judge a rework if you don't understand the need in the first place?

> idk why we can't have best of both worlds

Idk why you can't think positively? Change means opportunity. Why can't you just learn the new Swain or play a different champion. It's just one of over 100 champions in a constantly changing game. Stop being so attached.
i Hear you, so when your main gets wiped call me
